# Including plots

```{r age-hist-print1, include=FALSE}
# PLOT: Age distribution -------------------------------------------------------
ggplot(mockdata, aes(age)) +
  geom_histogram(color = 'white',
                 fill = scico(1, 
                              begin = .3, 
                              palette = "berlin"),
                 bins = 20) +
  labs(x = "Age", 
       y = "Count") +
  scale_y_continuous(
    breaks = scales::pretty_breaks()
  )
```
